document.full_text: upscale british shoemaker and retailer jimmy choo was bought by luxury goods group labelux from towerbrook capital partners lp, the companies said on sunday.
document.title: labelux buys jimmy choo for $812 million: sources
lines_and_colors: upscale british shoemaker and retailer jimmy choo was bought by luxury goods group labelux from towerbrook capital partners lp, the companies said on sunday.
